segments.text: What is your most preferred training method ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I prefer active rather than passive training . For example , I like the training offered by a financial software company from which we bought the newest updated virgin . They sent the programmers to demonstrate how to do and then ask us to practice . All employees receiving this training were in the same meeting room , so we could communicate with each other . We had a lot of fun learning together . It helps to build up the work relation among colleagues .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that is also very efficient , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , it is much better than just giving us some reading materials or information via the internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That â€™ s boring . Once we were asked to watch a video on how to operate the punches , all of us seemed to fall into sleep by the end of the video .
segments.speaker: S1
